characters.name: Darth Vader
characters.description: Originally a slave on Tatooine, Anakin Skywalker is a Jedi prophesied to bring balance to the Force. He is lured to the dark side of the Force by Palpatine and becomes a Sith lord

characters.name: The Mandalorian
characters.description: The Mandalorian, sometimes abbreviated as Mando,[2] is a sobriquet for Din Djarin, the protagonist of The Mandalorian television series

characters.name: Grogu
characters.description: Grogu, also known as The Child and colloquially referred to by fans and the media as Baby Yoda, is a young alien of the same species as popular Star Wars character Yoda.[
